metadata.title: CVE-2022-2031 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Samba. The security vulnerability occurs when KDC andthe kpasswd service share a single account and set of keys, allowing themto decrypt each other's tickets. A user who has been requested to changetheir password, can exploit this flaw to obtain and use tickets to otherservices.

criterions.comment: samba: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
